title: Bug 6536: Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, nothing happens.
EB: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the Javadoc should be added successfully.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 2. Select a field in the view and try to add Javadoc on it.
